title: Business logo font
content:
Please help me identify the font used on this logo.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Dutch logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725033642/http:/typophile.com/files/Dutch%20logo_0.jpg) | 23.16 KB |
author: walterioss

comments.content: Very close to **[Cruz Swinger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725033642/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cruz/swinger/)** by Ray Cruz [1972] but the /G is a bit different

You’re right! Thank you very much Mr. Vilanakis.  
walterioss.
